title: libert19
author: libert19
content: In case someone is unaware. Install any extension supported browser (Kiwi/Lemur/Mises), install and open tampermonkey and paste the script. Bitcointalk scripts can be found here.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Forgive me for asking a stupid question here but can someone please explain to me the benefits of utilizing these scriptings for btalk?

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on October 07, 2023, 07:42:08 PMForgive me for asking a stupid question here but can someone please explain to me the benefits of utilizing these scriptings for btalk? Each of the scripts have their own features and members like to run those scripts in order to enjoy those features. Let's say a member wants to have a dark theme on Bitcointalk then that member can easily use the script by Bitoken or franckuestein as both of them have made the scripts that can turn the theme of Bitcointalk into dark instead of the default one. Another important extension that users like to use is "Bitcointalk Extension - All In One v2.5 * by mrvuit" as that one has many features in a single package. Let's say a user want to block the signatures or avatars can easily accomplish that by installing the mrvuit extension. There are many such script that can be helpful for the members of the forum and the members enjoy using those scripts. Here is the link of the thread where you can find more details about those scripts.   LIST] Bitcointalk.org Userscripts/ Add-ons / SMF patches

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on October 08, 2023, 04:00:45 AMWow this is so cool, I just changed everything to dark mode. I think this might take some getting used to haha. I will look more into these features. What are some other features that you have found helpful? You can use this one  The message exceeds the maximum allowed length (64000 characters)  It's a script by TryNinja that will show you the number of characters left in the post. This script will help you a lot if you're going to make a long thread. Here's another script by the admin Cyrus  Report to moderator on post history With the help of this script you can easily report a post to the moderator from the post history of a member. This script is useful to report the members who use plagiarized content or are spammers which posts things that are against the rules of the forum. Reporting those posts by openining them in new tab takes time and this scripts make the job easy.Another great script that you can use is the script by grue  Enhanced merit UI [1.1]   This scripts makes it easier for you to merit the posts because with the help of this script you can merit a post without leaving the page. In default setting we'll have to move to another page in order to merit a post but with this script a pop-up opens and we can enter the number of merits we want to send to a post. There are many such scripts that you can try and they will make things easier for you.
